movies.title: Inception
movies.shortDescription: A thief uses dream-sharing tech to plant an idea in a target's mind.
movies.longDescription: Dom Cobb leads a specialist team that enters people’s dreams to extract secrets. Offered a chance to clear his criminal record, Cobb and his crew undertake an almost impossible job: inception — implanting an idea into a CEO’s subconscious. As dream-layers multiply, reality and memory dangerously blur.

reviews.text: A masterpiece of modern sci-fi storytelling.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.shortDescription: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks chaos.
movies.longDescription: Gotham's vigilante, Batman, teams with Lieutenant Gordon and DA Harvey Dent to dismantle organized crime. When the Joker emerges, he challenges Batman’s moral code, pushing the city to the brink and forcing impossible choices.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.shortDescription: A poor family schemes to infiltrate a wealthy household.
movies.longDescription: The Kim family, struggling with poverty, gradually insinuate themselves into the lives of the wealthy Park family. What begins as amusing con jobs turns dark as class tensions explode into violence and tragedy.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.shortDescription: A young couple's romance unfolds aboard the doomed RMS Titanic.
movies.longDescription: Jack and Rose come from different social classes but fall deeply in love during the Titanic's ill-fated maiden voyage. As the ship meets disaster, their love and survival instincts are put to the ultimate test.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.shortDescription: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.
movies.longDescription: An epic tale of power, family, and betrayal, The Godfather chronicles the Corleone crime family’s rise and the transformation of Michael Corleone from reluctant outsider to ruthless mafia boss.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.shortDescription: A young girl enters a magical world and must rescue her parents.
movies.longDescription: Chihiro stumbles into a spirit world and must work in a bathhouse for gods to free herself and her parents. A richly imaginative tale about courage, growth, and the power of compassion.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.shortDescription: A group travels through a wormhole to secure humanity's future.
movies.longDescription: Facing ecological collapse, a team of explorers travels through a wormhole searching for a new home for humanity. Bound by love, science, and sacrifice, Interstellar explores survival and the power of human connection across vast distances.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.shortDescription: Two imprisoned men form a life-changing friendship.
movies.longDescription: Wrongfully convicted banker Andy Dufresne forms a quiet bond with Red as they survive the brutal realities of prison life. A tale of hope, perseverance, and the human spirit.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.shortDescription: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, allies flee a tyrant in a high-octane chase.
movies.longDescription: Max joins Furiosa and her band of rebels on a desperate road escape from the Citadel ruled by Immortan Joe. A relentless, practically non-stop action spectacle with striking visuals and design.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.shortDescription: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress chase dreams in Los Angeles.
movies.longDescription: Sebastian and Mia pursue demanding creative dreams while navigating a loving but strained relationship. La La Land celebrates art, ambition, and the bittersweet choices that accompany success.

series.title: Breaking Bad
series.shortDescription: A chemistry teacher turns to manufacturing meth after a cancer diagnosis.
series.longDescription: Walter White, a high-school chemistry teacher, partners with former student Jesse Pinkman to produce methamphetamine after learning he has terminal cancer. As Walter climbs the criminal ladder he becomes hardened and dangerous, with consequences for his family and associates.

reviews.text: One of the greatest TV shows ever.

series.title: Game of Thrones
series.shortDescription: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne.
series.longDescription: Set in the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, noble families compete for power while ancient threats return. Political intrigue, shifting alliances, and epic battles define its sweeping tale of ambition and survival.

series.title: Stranger Things
series.shortDescription: Kids confront supernatural forces in a small town.
series.longDescription: After a young boy disappears, his friends and family uncover a secret government lab and a girl with mysterious abilities. Their search reveals a dark parallel dimension and a threat that grows with each strange occurrence.

series.title: The Crown
series.shortDescription: A dramatized history of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II.
series.longDescription: The Crown traces the life and reign of Queen Elizabeth II, exploring political rivalries, personal relationships, and the pressures of monarchy as the world and the royal family evolve across decades.

series.title: Chernobyl
series.shortDescription: Dramatization of the 1986 Chernobyl nuclear disaster and its aftermath.
series.longDescription: Chernobyl reconstructs the events surrounding the 1986 disaster, focusing on the people who fought to contain it and the political system that hindered the response. A harrowing, meticulous historical drama.

series.title: The Wire
series.shortDescription: An exploration of Baltimore's drug scene through law enforcement and others.
series.longDescription: The Wire examines institutions—from law enforcement to schools—through interwoven stories about the drug trade in Baltimore. It’s praised for realistic storytelling and complex characters.

reviews.text: Raw, honest and unmatched in scope.

series.title: Friends
series.shortDescription: Six friends navigate life and love in New York City.
series.longDescription: A beloved sitcom following six friends through their 20s and 30s as they deal with relationships, careers, and the ups and downs of life in Manhattan, with humor and heart.

series.title: The Mandalorian
series.shortDescription: A lone bounty hunter protects a mysterious child in the outer reaches.
series.longDescription: Set after the fall of the Empire, a lone Mandalorian bounty hunter accepts a mission that becomes a journey to protect a child with mysterious origins, uncovering secrets about the Force and the galaxy's fate.

reviews.text: A fresh and cinematic Star Wars tale.

series.title: Money Heist (La Casa de Papel)
series.shortDescription: A criminal mastermind plans ambitious heists with a masked crew.
series.longDescription: The Professor assembles a team to execute heists on the Royal Mint of Spain and later the Bank of Spain. A tense, stylish series of cat-and-mouse, loyalty, and rebellion.

series.title: Squid Game
series.shortDescription: Contestants play deadly children’s games for a massive cash prize.
series.longDescription: Hundreds of contestants deep in debt agree to play a series of childhood games for a chance at a life-changing prize, only to find the stakes are brutally lethal. Squid Game is a social allegory wrapped in tense survival drama.

hero.description: When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.
